plot: A human foot in a blood-soaked ballet slipper is found in a bin at a theater.

The foot of a ballerina is found but the rest of her body is missing. After finding the car she had been moved in Henry believes she might still be alive, if only just barely. Jo is going to Paris which provokes a painful memory from Henry's past. Abe may have found a clue about the location of Abigail.—an Ardent fan
